page.title: 03A Day in my life-1 Morning
page.content: I'm Michelle Tame and I'm ten years old. On school days I wake up at about 7.30am. I get out of bed, get dressed and go downstairs for my breakfast of cereals, toast and a cup of tea. Aterwards I clean my teeth, brush my hair and get my bag ready for school. At 8.45 I leave the house to walk to school where I talk to my friends on the playground until 9.00am when the bell rings and we go into school. Our teacher calls the class register and we work or read until it is time to go into assembly. During assembly we sing songs and say prayers and listen to a story. Next we go back to class to work until 10.30am when we go out to play. We can buy crisps and play all sorts of games. We go back in at 10.50 and work until 12.00 which is lunchtime. We go to wash our hands and get ready to eat.
